title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
description: The bug report lacks specific details about the issue.
OB: Insufficient information provided in the bug report to understand the observed behavior.
EB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. For example, if the report design is located in $project/test, the relative path should be stored accordingly.
SR: Steps to reproduce are not provided. Please include detailed steps to replicate the issue, starting from the initial state of the system.
